meanings.definition: Having a stale or moldy odor.
meanings.sent1: The basement smelled mustiest after the rain leaked in.
meanings.sent2: The old books in the library had the mustiest smell.
meanings.sent3: Even the mustiest corners of the attic couldn't hide the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent4: The mustiest scent of nostalgia lingered in the air of the abandoned house.
meanings.sent5: The mustiest aroma of decay filled the room, reminding me of forgotten memories.

meanings.definition: Showing signs of age or neglect.
meanings.sent1: The mustiest furniture in the antique shop had layers of dust on it.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house on the hill looked the mustiest of all.
meanings.sent3: Despite its mustiest appearance, the old car still ran smoothly.
meanings.sent4: The mustiest pages of the family photo album held the dearest memories.
meanings.sent5: The mustiest clothes in the closet were from a bygone era, untouched for years.

meanings.definition: Experiencing a feeling of dampness or decay.
meanings.sent1: The old tree in the backyard felt mustiest after the storm.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned building had the mustiest atmosphere, sending shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent3: The mustiest room in the house was oddly comforting on rainy days.
meanings.sent4: The mustiest corners of the garden held secrets of forgotten times.
meanings.sent5: The mustiest smell of decay wafted from the cellar, a reminder of the passage of time.
